item.title: Golang Note
item.description: Golang why golang c/c++ fast but have to carry historical burdens, slow compile java kinda same python, easy to use but slow. None of these are developed toward to the best performance in terms of concurrency Strong and staticaaly typed excellent comm. Key features simplicity fast compile times garbage collected compile to standaline binaries(all dependencies are in there) built-in concurrency package main // have to specify the package name import ( "fmt" ) func main() { fmt.
